Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of a light-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394121) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394121)
